body: As a standard action, a magus of 9th level or higher can expend an arcane point from his or his black blade's arcane pool, and can call his black blade from as far as 1 mile away, causing it to instantaneously teleport to his hand.
name: Teleport Blade
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Magus/Magus Archetypes/Bladebound/Black Blades/Black Blade Ability Descriptions/Teleport Blade
